abilities.name: Love Bullet
abilities.description: Deals 300 + (50% AD + 50% MD) physical damage to enemies. With Arcane Mastery: gains additional 50% MD scaling. With Healing Shot: can target allies to heal for 150% MD. With Chain Shot: 30% chance to fire at another enemy.

abilities.name: Flower Bomb
abilities.description: Throws a flower bomb, disabling one of the target's abilities for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Affection
abilities.description: Places a Heart Debuff on the target enemy. The target can only target Elphelt or her allies, and deals 50% less damage for 4 turns.

debuffEffect.name: Heart Debuff
debuffEffect.description: Enchanted by Elphelt. Can only target Elphelt or her allies. Deals 50% less damage.

abilities.name: Heart Storm
abilities.description: Fires a powerful shot that deals 350% Magical Damage to an enemy. 50% chance to bounce to new enemies (up to 5 bounces). Heals self for 10% of total damage dealt. With Arcane Mastery: gains additional 50% MD scaling.

passive.name: Defensive Maneuvers
passive.description: After using any ability, gains 10 Armor and 10 Magical Shield for 3 turns. This effect can stack.
